workflow_analysis: Test workflow demonstrating conditional step functionality. This workflow navigates to a test page and uses conditional steps to check for specific elements and stop execution based on various conditions.
name: Conditional Step Test Workflow
description: Demonstrates conditional step functionality with various condition types and actions

steps.description: Check if error element exists - should not stop workflow
Check if page title contains 'HTML' - should continue
Check if body element exists - should skip next step
This step should be skipped due to previous conditional
Check for h1 element with specific text
Final conditional - check if we're still on the right page
